events.message: I recently received my order, but the item arrived damaged with several scratches on its surface. This is very disappointing.
The reported issue involves a product arriving damaged and scratched, which matches the 'Product Defect' category.
The case has been assigned to a customer support agent specialized in handling product defect issues.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I'm sorry to hear about the condition of your product and I'm here to help resolve this issue.
Could you please provide photos of the damaged item as well as your order number so we can assess the situation more accurately?
I have attached the pictures of the scratched product and my order number is 987654321. Please let me know how we can proceed.
Thank you for the information. We can offer a replacement item or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would prefer a replacement item if it can be delivered promptly. Thank you for your quick response.
We have processed your replacement order and it will be shipped within 48 hours. You will receive tracking information shortly.
We wanted to check in to ensure that you have received the replacement product and that it meets your expectations.
Yes, I received the replacement today and it is in perfect condition. I appreciate the prompt support.
Thank you for confirming receipt of the replacement. We are glad to have resolved your issue and closed the case.
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey regarding your recent customer support experience.
